function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Non-standardized data collection and terminology","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges of data sharing","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Timely generation and dissemination of data","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagious disease transmission through primary data collection and sharing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Perception of science and research funding","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possibility of incomplete data capture due to studies not using specified search terms","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of covid-19 in the process of real-world evidence research","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate categorization of study topics and designs leading to misinterpretation of data","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large-scale data collection and sharing may lead to potential privacy breaches and data security risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate morbidity and mortality of specific ethnic populations increases the risk of social and healthcare inequalities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Collaborative data sharing across multiple countries may lead to cross-border legal and regulatory challenges.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited coverage of commercial covid-19 ehr data in regions outside north america","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in using data for research due to differing health record systems and local processes","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete data capture due to rapid introduction of new coding and system burden","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of large-scale health data for research","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumptions on quality assurance for clinical trials","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unclear endorsement of critical appraisal tools for research using ehr data","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Little endorsement by medical journals on standards for publication of research utilizing ehrs or other real-world data sources","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited success in integrating routinely collected health-care data into clinical trial activities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Substantial non-capture of medical services in systems without electronic data capture","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low visibility into health inequities and limited engagement of diverse clinical research groups","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Selection bias in real-world evidence research and disparities in health-care use","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor recording of patients’ ethnicity and race in health data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of data sharing in covid-19 research","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variability in data sharing formats and standards","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of clarity in sharing observational data","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in sharing individual patient-level data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of trust in existing safeguards for research data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in sharing medical data at the individual patient level","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infrequent audit and enforcement of data sharing by scientific journals and governing bodies","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate data reporting in trial registries and data sharing platforms","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Concerns over global health inequities in data sharing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in sharing clinical trial data during a global pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low percentage of trials published and results available","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Absence of centralized, sponsor-driven primary data sharing","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Multifaceted reasons for non-data sharing, including unawareness of legal requirements and language barriers","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Scarcity of data sharing during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Legal frameworks for international research creating challenges in synthesising data assets","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sociopolitical barriers to data sharing within and between institutions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Restricted data access due to commercial or financial reasons","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of data sharing for non-clinical trial data in covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reproducibility concern in clinical research, especially for digital-health technologies","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fraudulent research activities related to covid-19","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased public engagement with emerging research","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Timely and independenlty conducted reproducible analytics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate data sharing and reporting in medical research","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of standardized and accessible data formats","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High variability and lack of monitoring in guidance for data sharing","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid sharing of molecular data may lead to unintentional release of sensitive information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data collection and efforts may lead to ineffective management of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
